TextLibrary.Text: I like your style, yes I do. How about we enter into an arrangement, you and I?
I like your style, yes I do. How about we enter into an arrangement, you and I?
I hook you up with some special Cargo, and you go out and look for some special buyers.
I hook you up with some special Cargo, and you go out and look for some special buyers.
Go to Procyon X and meet my supplier. Give him 5500 Credits and he'll look after you. Got it?
Go to Procyon X and meet my supplier. Give him 5500 Credits and he'll look after you. Got it?
